title: Samlucky O
author: Samlucky O
created_time: October 13, 2023, 11:53:17 AMLast edit: October 13, 2023, 12:22:35 PM by Samlucky O
content: I no say wetting I dey talk go be like say I no make sense, because we supposed to dey discuss about crypto related topics but sometimes people just need to get fun. Oyibo say " all work without play make Jack a doll boy.Before you find yourself for this forum come rank up like this, come dey flex like say you been no suffer before. How life been dey for you? Because the way the country be like this, without this Bitcoin forum, I no no how life for be for many people here. Employment nowadays don become mordern day slavery. I dey always ask myself say which day all this suffering go end? You go dey plan another thing another thing go dey happen, you go promise and fail due to the hardship of the economy. You go find work tire you no go see. even say you see, Dem go dey demand money before you go start, and if you no get am or you no sabi person, forget about am. Even if you get the work to pay person na problem. payment date go reach your boss go postponed am to another month. If you come late your boss go treat you like say you no get person for house before you come find work. Them go dey give you work wey your papa no fit give you and expecting you to finish am withing few hours, while there children dey abroad dey enjoy life. Although no be yours fault say your papa no get money. You wey dey inport goods how far? Sometimes custome go size your goods because of one small thing.You go manage save money start up something to earn a living, because of family problem your shop go shutdown even when responsibilities still get your head. You don dey old, you never Mary because you no get money. The woman you soppos mary don find somebody because you no get money. You wey get handwork, how far? Work dey? Dem go call you for work almost every state to come work but wetting dey happen na? You be like water we no dey move. You wey dey do driving work how far? Fuel don cost, to buy fuel wey you go take make money for street na problem. You go carry passengers, police go dey stop you every bustop dey collect money. Everyday you dey one mechanic or the other sotay all the mechanic don sabi you. Dem go even give you one name like " PUSH AND START"  You wey go collect higher purchase how far? Person go buy keke for #1m give you for #2.5m higher purchase. You go dey hustle all day and night and if you make any mistake, dem go collect am for your hand give am to another person after you don suffer finish. Anyway God dey Sha.My country people if I continue to dey explain wetting man eye  don see ehh. No be chise... As you wey don dey the street of 9ja wey no what up make we dey carry ourselves alonf. Oyibo say no man is an island of knowledge" make the spirit of 9ja dey guid us even for the forum. Anywhere ona see us dey make mistake, make ona correct us because the street no dey friendly. Be your brothers keeper..Make e no be us wey go cause our brother downfall. For here as BITCOIN don offer solution to our problem make we dey maintain ourselves make we no dey carry 9ja mentality enter this forum. Make Dem no put eye for us here because 9ja get bad influence. Abeg make we coordinate ourselves make this table no fall. Shout out to our oga them wey dey coordinate this we Naija local board. I no wan mention name but you know yourselves.                                   Niaja no dey carry last     Thank you     SAMLUCKY O.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Bro you try, no be small thing you write for here, and na wattin dey go on for we country be this, I remember when I been dey find IT placement, bro I waka 7 companies any one wey I reach dem go tell me say I gat get connection, that is, i must know person wey dey work for the company to say na my brother be this before dem go fit reason my matter, no be say na job I dey find oo. Omor the country hard I no lie you na only God dey help us package ourselves wey we take dey survive so, seriously like this I be electrician but if I tell you when last I see work en e go burst your head, money no dey anywhere sotay people don dey do their own repair by dem self.When you talk about job nowadays wey don be like modern slaver, na me you been dey talk about because wattin I carry my eye see when I been dey learn handwork en e no easy for me, sometimes my Ogah go tell me to go farm go clear very large portion of land, wattin concern land concern electrical , other times e go carry all em dirty cloths give me to watch and e get wife for house  , just like that so many unspeakable things wey I carry my eye see before I fit learn handwork to take survive. So my Brother life nor easy oo this period na so so groceries (garri) and floating Berry man pikin dey chop but I nor dey reason the way life be because I believe say once I rank up for this forum things go change for good.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: My brother when I been dey secondary school, my psychology change because of how I been dey see uncle and Aunty them go graduate like this work no dey for them to work, how I take get advantage like this na because I been dey very open to understanding life the hard way so e really help me grow for this country when most of my friends then been dey pursue School me been dey pursue hustle and skills. E no too hard to be successful for Naija if you look well, where the problem dey be say we as humans no dey wan take time think and advise our selves, rather na impressions we humans wan dey do.
